website_summaries.verdict: Simple, single camera option that's protected against weather.
pros: Keep an eye on your front door, back door, or any other area of your property with this single security camera
Includes the ability to speak through the camera
Easy to install with a magnetic mount
Will work at night with infrared LEDs that yield excellent resolution and video quality
cons: Needs a very fast Internet connection

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Useless unless you buy the nest aware with a monthly fee. Will not give you more than 2 hours of feed. Will not alert you when someone is in the video camera. Gave it a 2 star for easy installation and good picture quality only.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Halley

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with the camera. Mounting the camera took 5 mins. 2 screws mount a magnet that the camera then sticks to which makes aiming the thing virtually infinite. There is a converter that converts the USB to 120v power that requires 1 screw to mount. Came with 10 or so plastic clips that makes the install tidy. Usage is equally good. Night vision is clear. Microphone is crisp. Speaker was a little quiet but what do you expect? A bullhorn? Takes a pic when it sees a face and records video. All while requiring a Wi-Fi source and a simple power outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Flores

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Setup is very easy. If you have a 5GHZ WiFi be sure to connect this device to the NON 5GHZ option. If you don’t know what that means or do not see that by the WiFi name when searching you’ll be fine. It tripped me up for a minute but it works flawlessly. Customer service is top notch with Nest you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Nope do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t work . It is unstable . I have super good expensive router. I WANT MY MONEY BACK!!
customer_reviews.author: Ward Family

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for the product, 4 stars for the subscription
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up and delivered great results. I was also very happy with my ability to customize my push notifications or alerts. I docked one star because I don't think this listing is clear enough about how without a $3 monthly subscription (first month free) this camera is useless. I paid it without hesitation, and it's worth it, but it just felt a bit misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Rem_B

customer_reviews.title: So easy a caveman can use it.
customer_reviews.text: He picture quality is amazing. You can easily read license plate numbers in your driveway even at night. I knew about the subscription before buying this and was okay paying $100 a year. It’s so easy to use the app searching the history my 8 year old can do it. I love that you can have it alert you when it sees a person or hears talking instead of just generic motion and noise. I also like the home and away feature so it only alerts me when I’m away. The install was very simple. No codes or pairing, just scan the QR code and it sets everything up.
customer_reviews.author: On the Job

customer_reviews.title: Power problems
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping to have a camera up and installed before I went on vacation to watch over my house and the people taking care of my animals but the camera will not connect power up unless plugged into computer. So now I have to call nest about getting a new power cord. How could a power cord be bad out of the box?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless as Security Camera with the most recent software update.
customer_reviews.text: With the recent software update, Google forces the status LED to be on at all times. At night this camera stands out in the darkness, actually alerting the potential intruder of its location and field of view. This blatant and intentional flaw makes my house actually less secure because potential intrude is made aware of camera's location and is able to bypass it. I called Nest and requested to return the camera for a refund, since the camera is now useless as a security device, and my request was denied. Google cares more about someone else's "privacy" than about the security of its paying customers. Will never purchase Nest or Google again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect clarity
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of ring cameras and I do like them very much, My have is outfitted with both google and Amazon assistants. I purchased the Nest outdoor cam to add to my Amazon in home assistant devices and I have to say I am completely satisfied with my purchase. Received package on time. it took a couple of days for me to find time to install but the install was quick and easy. setup was a breeze and now my home is completely covered. Very happy customer here and will be purchasing one more, I just have to decide if I want the outdoor cam or outdoor IQ.
customer_reviews.author: PDeats

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these cameras that I purchased a year ago. When I first received them, they worked as expected with relatively quick response time and timely alerts. After 6 months, I began experiencing 30-120 second delays, and often didn’t receive an alert at all. Now, a year later I am rarely receiving alerts. This defeats the entire purpose of having a motion detecting camera, and it now only serves as a tool for viewing footage retroactively now. I'm now looking for a better option and suggest that you do also.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: Subscription so expensive
customer_reviews.text: Really bad can not record the videos you have to paid then them will record it for you so sad I found it after I buy and it can not return right now
customer_reviews.author: tina shi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with saving clips of videos I needed for court
customer_reviews.text: As long as you have a really good WiFi connection, it works well. High quality picture during the day and about 5 feet of high visibility at night. Major draw back is trying to save a clip. I needed several minutes of recorded video for court and every time I set the clip up with the time I needed, it automatically went back by two minutes and recorded one of those minutes instead. I tried repeatedly and could not get the video I needed to save. Somewhat defeats the purpose of having it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Clear picture, great camera. I don't use the speaker feature, but if that's a big point for you the internal speaker is pretty bad and not that loud. I would expect better for this price point. Also, the installation was easy, but the anatomy of the cable is such that you have to drill an unnecessarily large hole in wall to run the cable. Wasn't thrilled about doing that. Barring those two things the camera is pretty solid. Night vision was much better than I expected. Seems well made and durable. Has a very wide field of view, I knew that before I bought it but you don't realize just how wide it is until it's looking at your property.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna McMullen

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLE! Simple install, connection and user friendly cammands.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. I had ordered a competitor camera the first time and wireless connection was a nightmare. I returned that cam. Nest cam was simple to connect. Great picture and sound and adjusting camera view was so easy with the magnetic ball and socket mount. Slight Cons: Has to be hard wired for power so maybe not convenient if there is not a close power supply. Does not have a back up flash drive for recording if your WiFi is out but it is very difficult to find a security cam system that provides both. The one I did find with that feature was a nightmare to connect to WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron H.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: WOW THIS LOOKS AMAZING. I had lower standers compared to other cameras I’ve used. Love it!! This will help so much. Makes me feel so safe. Fully recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kaden Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Good hardware poor Google integration
customer_reviews.text: The Nest hardware works well. The cameras are reliable and give good image quality. They work well at night, but the range is adequate not stellar. The hardware is 5 star. The Nest app was very good until they merged with Google. Now some previously easy tasks are very complicated if you can do them at all. If the hardware wasn’t so expensive, I would replace all my nest cameras with someone’s else’s because of the Google integration. I give this part 0 stars. Overall I would not buy Nest again or recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Low Profile, Great Addition to Home Security
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to place near one of our exterior doors. The process of getting the camera hooked up takes no time at all, but we did struggle a bit with running the power cord (requires a plugin). The kit itself is well thought out and comes with all the items needed to get the camera and cord affixed and tucked away. The picture and sound quality are excellent and we've already loved using the app for our other Nest products so it was that much more seamless to integrate. Would purchase again if in need of exterior cameras in the future.
customer_reviews.author: A La Rose

customer_reviews.title: Nest outdoor camera
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 of these on my property being that it is a half acre for security. These are amazing especially the night vision the video quality is perfect! Crystal clear images and I am able to zone in on captured screen shots. These will tell you if they heard a dog barking, a person talking, or movement in the selected area and notify you via computer/cellphone/tablet, or laptop immediately. I feel so much better with these Nest cams. There is a small subscription fee to hold the videos in the Nest banks if you choose to do that.
customer_reviews.author: JoeG65

customer_reviews.title: Google made a terrible change!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is absolutely POINTLESS now that google changed how it operates. Google decided to no longer allow the user to disable the “on” light. Rendering a discrete SECURITY camera USELESS. The green/blue light draws a criminal in, faster than a moth to a flame. Used to love these cameras and recommend them to everyone. Dumbest decision ever and I will no longer promote or purchase these cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and it works great.
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this outdoor camera. Tried to convert the indoor Nest Camera I purchased 3 years ago but wanted to put that one outside since a camera came with my alarm system. Purchased a weather proof case for it, looks great in the day but at night you see some reflections from the infrared LEDs. This outdoor Nest Cam looks exceptional day or night and have had zero problems with it or the one I purchased 3 years ago. Wish they’d lower the price a little. Would buy many more.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Brook

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Best money I have ever spent! It works perfectly, all my neat products do. They may cost a bit more but they work and do what they are supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Beth615

customer_reviews.title: Lots of notifications and lots of “system offline” issues.
customer_reviews.text: After having this for a few months and dealing with it constantly going offline I am getting frustrated. The picture is good and the system was easy to install but the app and the unit go offline A LOT in my opinion and I spend a lot of time waiting for it to go back online to arm or disarm the system when I am “away”.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quallity security camera but not particularly cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to go "all nest". So the cost was not an option. But it sends a good pic to my I phone and alerts me of noise and motion. It can talk to me, and I can talk to the camera!! Pretty neat. Its easy to program and multiple devices are displayed depending on site and number of cameras. The best part???? I can tell if the AC is working properly in my Florida home! Cool. !!!! And change the temp, and check the humidity and power usage!!! Like it.
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: This system is the best in the market in my opinion!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera! It is clear, the notifications are wonderful, and the night vision is really good as well. I feel safer, easy to keep track on packages being delivered, and you know when people come and go from your home!
customer_reviews.author: R.White

customer_reviews.title: I would buy another one if needed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the camera now for 6 months and I’m happy with it. The install was easy and I’ve enjoyed being able to keep an eye on the house and watch the kids get on the bus from work. If I need another camera I would purchase this one again. I do wish the cloud service was free, but 50 bucks a year really isn’t that much.
customer_reviews.author: Trenchgold

customer_reviews.title: Really love the nest cam
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad who is technologically challenged and he loves it! Although I did help him set it up he is able to use the ap on his own. It’s a great way to keep track of who’s going in and out of your house/what’s going on with deliveries while you’re not home.
customer_reviews.author: NSKDodge

customer_reviews.title: Keeping track of kids
customer_reviews.text: Extremely useful for tracking activity outside the home. Very helpful for knowing who/when people enter and exit the house.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Plummr

customer_reviews.title: Great cameras
customer_reviews.text: Super quality camera. Easy to install and outstanding customer service should you have any questions. This is my second set of nest cameras as we left the old ones at her other house when we moved.
customer_reviews.author: Scott in Tampa

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation is always a +++
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been needing a camera in our home, and this is perfect. Easy installation is always a plus. The picture quality is pretty good, but it does go blurry from time to time (may be due to WiFi connection). I really like that I’m able to hear and speak through the mic. :)
customer_reviews.author: E. Kana

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is super easy to install and it has a great clear picture. The night video is really good quality too. I love that it sends me notifications when there is movement in my backyard. We have a neighbor who complains about our dogs so we can see what is going on with them throughout the day while we are away. I love that we can talk to them also. I am VERY happy we chose the NEST camera. We will be purchasing more of the NEST products in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There is a monthly charge associated with this product!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has a monthly cost which is not listed on any notes in the advertisement. That is very decieving because I can not afford 30.00 per month. I would like to know if there is a lower cost otherwise I may need to return.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Works as I expected it to work.
customer_reviews.text: There were so many cameras to choose from it was mind boggling. I have had a Nest thermostat for years and trust the brand. The outdoor camera is well built and came with everything I needed to install. Pretty painless installation. Easy to add to my existing Nest account. Overall pleased with my decision to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: StrangeBrew

customer_reviews.title: Temp Range Too Low
customer_reviews.text: Did not install. After receiving I read specs. Max operating temp is 104F. I’m in Texas. Seriously? It needs to be at least 115F. Returning. Plus it needs to be hardwired, so I’d have to install an outlet in my attic.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great! Love to look in my house while im not there
customer_reviews.author: Catalina MG

customer_reviews.title: Horrible camera
customer_reviews.text: Horrible Horrible this camera loses connection all the time and never is reliable!!! I have other Nest products and never had so many issues with outdoor cam. I only go with Nest because they have great products. NOT THIS ONE very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great replacement for my previous outdoor camera
customer_reviews.text: The night vision is clear and crisp. The notifications to my phone are exactly what I was looking for. The installation kit was even extremely easy to use. I wish I had bought this initially.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R Jolley Jr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to view and install.
customer_reviews.text: Its extremely easy to set up and mount, I whish there would be choice of color, also white wire is not best choice for outdoor use. Expensive compare to competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Plonka

customer_reviews.title: Can't get it to work.
customer_reviews.text: I spent hours with this thing and the best I could get is a 60 second delay on the video. This doesn't help me at all if I need to watch it live. I'm trying to use it outside so I bought an internet booster and had to run an ethernet cable to the booster because wifi with the booster didn't help. Problem solved until I put the camera outside 2 feet from the booster and the screen says your camera is unplugged or no internet. This is my 3rd attempt with multiple hours wasted and I probably can't return it, I've had it too long. Do not buy this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Love nest products! I have tried similar cameras for outside and you honestly get what you pay for. Nest may be more expensive but hands down it is by far the most superior camera on the market. It’s easy to use and even easier to install and set up!
customer_reviews.author: adam lambing

customer_reviews.title: Great cams!
customer_reviews.text: I have three outdoor cams and am excited to see what goes on in my yard when I’m not there. I have videos of bear, mtn lions, skunks, deer, raccoons, turkeys, bobcats and foxes as well as stray pets that need to return to their owners . Great fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Cam
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Nest Outdoor cam. I’m very happy with the easy app. I feel like I’m safe when away from home. Easy to install as long as you have Wi-Fi . Will probably buy another in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Paul McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Nice having  your on security
customer_reviews.text: After I had nest doorbell in front of house had to get this for backyard. Very happy with this purchase. 1 month so far and absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Da Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Backup security.
customer_reviews.text: Installing easy just loses signal constantly constantly having to reconnect to the internet only 7 ft from wifi. Not sure worth the money going to continue to look for other choices
customer_reviews.author: Sherri L. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Does its job well, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Overall its very solid. Bought the 50/yr Nest plan for it so take that into account when looking at this item. But the app works well with notifications and being able to set up custom alerts for zones. Picture quality is solid unless youre trying to zoom way in (none of that CSI "enhance, enhance" magic). Good nightvision. Install is very simple as long as you know how to use a drill. Comes with everything required.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton S

customer_reviews.title: Google really screwed this up!
customer_reviews.text: The company wants me to migrate to Google Nest, what a piece of crap! If I add ANYBODY THEY have the ability to wipe out the and turn off the whole system. They basically ALL HAVE ADMINISTRATOR ACCESS and nobody at NEST can change this. This is so messed up. I was going to put this system in my other apartments but now! Forget it. What is the use of having a system that ALL people have administrator status on.
customer_reviews.author: James Chucka

customer_reviews.title: Quality of video
customer_reviews.text: Love, love! We use it for outdoor use because we have so much wildlife activity. Actually didn’t realize how much activity we had until we installed the video cam. I am able to share videos with friends, family, and neighbors. I can give my neighbors a heads up on bear activity and everything else that comes through. The best thing is the quality of the video!!! WOW
customer_reviews.author: Kathy McKimmy

customer_reviews.title: Superior security cam
customer_reviews.text: Superior security cam. I have tried others but this is by far the best. Easy to install and set up, crystal clear video.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce E Balemian

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy set up. Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and use. Took me 10 minutes for one camera, if that. Make sure you have a good Wi-Fi signal.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: It an ok cam
customer_reviews.text: Very low range in WiFi Cañete had to put very close to my router as to get a signal I have other outdoor plugs and camera that are way further from my router and get good signal they need to improve that WiFi range everything esos is good also night vision should be in color night vision could also get some improvement
customer_reviews.author: Victor Ollet

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: I really like these cameras, at times they will lose wifi connection. I did purchase an extender which seemed to help, but still spotty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: It works with nest. It costs less that what ADT was going to set up--I still have ADT
customer_reviews.author: george mestas

customer_reviews.title: Keep pointed to a very narrow area.
customer_reviews.text: Very, very sensitive to EVERYTHING. Goes off on cars, blowing trees, barking dogs ect., ect., ect.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, Great features! The flame thrower add-on is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I needed to know when the UPS or Fed-Ex folks showed-up as I kept missing them even when I was at home. This camera works great for that as the app sends me a message whenever it detect motion or a person. I highly recommend the flame thrower add-on if you can afford it. It produces a truly impressive 6 foot flame! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A. Votaw

customer_reviews.title: Great camera,
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Great video quality , great sound for a small Wifi camera. Have used video footage to help police with several crimes on my Block
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: DIY - easy
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these and they never fail. Easy to place, easy to start up.
customer_reviews.author: N. G. Cofresi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got two of them. They are great. I’ll be getting more of them
customer_reviews.author: Gsims

customer_reviews.title: Water behind lens/stopped functioning in less than 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: Water got behind the lens leading to blurry picture. Camera stopped working after about three weeks after noticing this condition. I’m assuming the water intrusion damaged the components inside the housing over time. This camera did not even last 2 years. Not worth the purchase price, especially when considering monthly subscription fee for Nest Aware.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK CALLAHAN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, great image and features
customer_reviews.text: Great cameras,, have 4 of them. You need to have the bandwidth to run them effectively
customer_reviews.author: Mike Z

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift and the owner loves it great picture quality! Delivered in the usual Amazon way.. On time every time!
customer_reviews.author: DozaTop Contributor: Ukuleles

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to set up, easy to maintain - perfect for home use!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: dead in one years time- get the extra protection!
customer_reviews.text: The picture was never very sharp... didn't stay on wifi well despite other devices doing fine in same location, and completely dead in one year's time. SO disappointing for SO much $$!
customer_reviews.author: applegirl916

customer_reviews.title: Good quality easy to install and seems durable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and it comes with a lot of slack in the cord. I love nest products
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Love the nest outdoor cam, easy setup and works great. Fast shipping from seller.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Welborn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and app gives you quick response to activity occurring in the view of the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Richard O. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and great picture
customer_reviews.text: Perfect with the extra length of cord!! Installed easy and linked to my existing nest account easily!
customer_reviews.author: Dana M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: No better camera out there. This was my 4th Nest.
customer_reviews.author: PeterH

customer_reviews.title: app dosen't work
customer_reviews.text: since google took over the nest camera the app dosent work well its allways going off line i paid for service but you only get to put one camera for additional cameras you have to pay more
customer_reviews.author: robert bowman

customer_reviews.title: New version
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes the new version of this camera They use the camera indoors in their toddlers room and like that they can review the last 12 hours without subscribing to a service Will eventually move the cameras outdoors after the children are older
customer_reviews.author: Cindi LaFayette

customer_reviews.title: Great video
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised ! Audio needs to be adjusted, not loud enough to speak to someone.
customer_reviews.author: HUBBA

customer_reviews.title: Great view
customer_reviews.text: Great view of my whole front yard front door drive way and street.
customer_reviews.author: Mamadoo

customer_reviews.title: Second one bought!  Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Second one purchased. Very easy to review history and download clips.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hussung

customer_reviews.title: If you want your stuff safe get this camera
customer_reviews.text: Look no further this camera is very nice definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: texasrebel

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is the one that works well. We had a difficult time getting it hooked up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camera Quit Working
customer_reviews.text: I have contacted the Protection plan I purchased as well for this. I have 2 other Nest Cameras and they are just fine.....This one is terrible. I need a new one. Please contact me.....
customer_reviews.author: Katherine H.

customer_reviews.title: First but not last Nest product.
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable you easy to install and set up. I have the info sent to both my iPad and iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G Ehlers

customer_reviews.title: the nest
customer_reviews.text: love the nest easy to move and put in the right place for security
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nest security camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera was very easy to install and set up. I also have the Nest thermostat which works great. I also like the ability to set up zones for detection.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect I love my Nest Cameras. Great quality in sound and picture
customer_reviews.author: Todd Casparius

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Easy set up and great picture quality for daytime and nighttime.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Love Nest
customer_reviews.text: I have every product nest makes and I absolutly love their quality and product
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Meadows III

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a Christmas gift for my father, the system was easy to set up and use. The picture quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, have several and no issues with them at all. Easy setup and great quality image.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: really like it- easy to install- happy that I added a second camera
customer_reviews.author: jim Bransfield

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Used outside my garage. Very easy to install. Took minutes.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Setup
customer_reviews.text: While no longer top of the Nest line, the camera is durable and easy to setup. Great Value!
customer_reviews.author: Hillbilly Deluxe Sportfishing

product_meta.title: Google Nest Plug-in Outdoor White Wi-Fi Security Camera
product_meta.description: This is New In Box, Never used or Open
